thread.title: AT&T Says Revenue Will Likely Miss
thread.title_full: AT&T Says Revenue Will Likely Miss - WSJ

author: Thomas Gryta
title: AT&T Says Revenue Will Likely Miss
text:
AT&T Inc. warned Wednesday that its third-quarter revenue will likely fall below Wall Street’s expectations, a surprise disclosure the day before the telecom is slated to report its latest results.
The company said revenue estimates are “inflated” because of a discrepancy in how analysts are accounting for its $49 billion acquisition of... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
